pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Convenience Layer for CouchDB // Provides a collection of functions for basic database and document management operations such as add, get, list or delete. Every cdbFunction() gets and returns a list() containing the connection setup. Such a list (in the documentation mostly called cdb) can be generated by cdb - cdbIni(). Then, the list cdb provides some functions respectively functionality e.g cdb$baseUrl() or cdb$getDocRev().
